post.description: Uploads file to the server and returns a unique ID that represents this file. Attach this unique ID to requests to claim this file. Unclaimed files will be removed after 1 hour

id.description: unique id created by the server

post.description: Create a zip file from given file URIs and returns the URI for that zip file. Unauthorized or non-existing files will be skipped.

get.description: Returns tasks and subtasks that are related to the `active` personnel
Returns a single task and it's subtasks that is related to the `active` personnel

data.description:
* 					Depending on the event type, this object will contain following properties: 
 * 					`type == 1` => `{ status_old: int, status_new: int }`,
 * 					`type == 2` => `{ title_old: string, title_new: string }`,
 * 					`type == 3` => `{ assignee: int }`,
 * 					`type == 4` => `{ assignee: int }`,
 * 					`type == 5` => `{ description: string }`,
 * 					`type == 6` => `{ due_date_old: string(datetime), due_date_new: string(datetime) }`,
 * 					`type == 7` => `{ title: string }`,
 * 					`type == 8` => `{ title: string }`,
 * 					`type == 10` => `{ priority_old: int, priority_new: int }`,
 * 					`type == 11` => `{ location: { latitude: string, longitude: string } }`,
 * 					`type == 12` => `{ name: string }`,
 * 					`type == 13` => `{ name: string }`,
 * 					`type == 14` => `{ start_date_old: string(datetime), start_date_new: string(datetime) }`
 *

enabler.description: NULL if event was triggered by the system

uploader.description: NULL if attachment was added by the system

procedure_type.description:
* 			`(Numarataj) Numbering = 1`
 *			`(Yap Ruhsat) BuildingPermit = 2`
 *			`(naat stikamet Rlevesi) ConstructionDirectionSurveying = 3`
 *			`(Kot Kesit Rlevesi) ElevationProfileSurveying = 4`
 *			`(Yola Terk) Expropriation = 5`
 *			`(fraz) Parcelling = 6`
 *			`(Tevhit) Amalgamation = 7`
 *			`(Ecrimisil) OccupationCompensationByManagement = 8`
 *			`(Ecrimisil - Vatanda) OccupationCompensationByCitizen = 9`
 *			`(1/5000 lekli Plan Deiimi) PlanChange1to5000Internal = 10`
 *			`(1/5000 lekli Plan Deiimi - Vatanda) PlanChange1to5000External = 11`
 *			`(Ykm Ruhsat) DeconstructionPermit = 12`
 *			`(Avan Proje) PreliminaryDesign = 13`
 *			`(Yazl mar Durumu) WrittenZoningStatus = 14`
 *			`Riskli Yap = 15`
 *			`Kira Yardm (Mal Sahibi) = 16`
 *			`Kira Yardm (Kirac) = 17`
 *			`Test = 18`
